articles.title: The end of one-chip wonders: Why Nvidia, Intel and AMD's valuations have experienced massive upheaval
articles.content: It wasn't that long ago that Intel Corp. was the unquestioned king of U.S. chip makers and the largest semiconductor company by market capitalization. But it's also not that long since most computing was done with a PC.

articles.title: Twitter employees blanch at prospect of Musk ownership
articles.content: Ultimately Musk's gambit, however serious, could force Twitter's board to consider other acquisition offers in addition to Musk as part of a fiduciary duty. That, in turn, could put Twitter in play for another corporate suitor, possibly Google parent Alphabet Inc., Amazon.com Inc., Facebook parent Meta Platforms Inc. or a media conglomerate like Comcast Corp.
